channel.title: Are Machines Intelligent? :: Intro CS Textbook
channel.description: YouTube Video Resources Slides Video Script But let’s continue our talk here a little bit more about intelligent behavior and what that means with human behavior as well, and when we’re trying to actually make AI that seems human. And so one of the problems with AI is that it forces the computer to mimic all human behavior, not just intelligence. And so when we start to create an AI for it to truly be human like, right, it has to do all of our own behavior.
